overview:
Daniel has spent the last 18 years introducing innovative software solutions to the global marketplace.

He has worked within large organizations but more recently with start-ups who were marketing complicated SaaS solutions for global organizations. Daniel has established and maintains an extensive senior network in a variety of industries that include retail, travel, automotive, CPG and consumer electronics. Some of the companies that he has worked with include Dell, Lenovo, Logitech, Toshiba, Sony, Williams Sonoma, Avery, PetSmart, CDW, P&G, Kellogg, Unilever, Kraft, Hyatt, Hilton, IHG, Expedia, Travelocity, United Airlines, Air Canada, GM, Ford, BMW, Jaguar, Hyundai, Lexus, Mercedes-Benz, VW, Mazda, FedEx, Shutterfly, Fandango and Cox Communications.
